SELECT V.UUID, V.CODE, V.TITLE, V.ISSUE_TYPE, V.PRIORITY, V.VERSION_CODE, V.principal, V.create_user FROM v_issue V LEFT JOIN s_users S ON V.create_user = S.username LEFT JOIN s_users S1 ON V.principal = S1.username WHERE 1=1
AND V.CODE like CONCAT('%',#{issue_code},'%')
AND V.TITLE like CONCAT('%',#{issue_name},'%')
AND S.NICKNAME like CONCAT('%',#{query_create_user},'%')
AND S1.NICKNAME like CONCAT('%',#{query_principal},'%')
AND V.ISSUE_TYPE = #{query_issue_type}
AND V.STATE = #{query_state}
ORDER BY V.create_time DESC

SELECT t.uuid, t.task_code issue_code, t.object_code, t.model_code, t.title, t.description, t.principal, u1.nickname principal_user_name, t.parent_code, t.version_code, t.priority, t.working_day, t.deadline, t.state, t.is_read, t.is_enable, t.create_time, t.create_user, u2.nickname create_user_name FROM t_task t LEFT JOIN s_users u1 ON u1.username = t.principal AND u1.isenable = '1' LEFT JOIN s_users u2 ON u2.username = t.create_user AND u2.isenable = '1' WHERE t.uuid = #{uuid}

SELECT t.uuid, t.bug_code issue_code, t.object_code, t.model_code, t.title, t.description, t.principal, u1.nickname principal_user_name, t.parent_code, t.version_code, t.priority, t.bug_level, t.result, t.deadline, t.state, t.is_read, t.is_enable, t.create_time, t.create_user, u2.nickname create_user_name FROM t_bug t LEFT JOIN s_users u1 ON u1.username = t.principal AND u1.isenable = '1' LEFT JOIN s_users u2 ON u2.username = t.create_user AND u2.isenable = '1' WHERE t.uuid = #{uuid}
